text: @GavinNewsom The number of people who have died in California from  The Corona WAS  over 15,000 from the CDC. After going back and looking at those who REALLY died from the virus we now have 2,745 deaths.From the coronavirus.That’s right,only 2,745! Look it up!! Yet still on lock down!!??!!
